body_html: It's actually super simple to do this, because the only reason why optimizer needs a model, is to call parameters() and iterate over them. We could just allow specifying any iterable and use this instead.
body_text: It's actually super simple to do this, because the only reason why optimizer needs a model, is to call parameters() and iterate over them. We could just allow specifying any iterable and use this instead.
body: It's actually super simple to do this, because the only reason why optimizer needs a model, is to call `parameters()` and iterate over them. We could just allow specifying any iterable and use this instead.
